recipesJson.name: ♡Grandma's Oatmeal Raisin Cookies♡
recipesJson.author: KRUCIAL
recipesJson.description: Simple and plain and extremely authentic Oatmeal Raisin Cookie recipe. There is no cream filling and if you want milk get off your ass and go to your fridge, because you won't find it in this profile. Only made possible with the help of Jason "Jbird" Davis, Thanks bro. ((((((((((2-1-2017; VERSION 2 COMING SOON))))))))))

reviews.text: I love oatmeal raisin cookies, my favorite cookie to eat. I was pretty skeptical about it translating into a vape, but this recipe nails it and I really enjoy it.

This is strange. Not bad! But hard to define. I whipped it up (had to order Oatmeal Raisin) and let it sit the 10 days and just now fired it up. It kind of nails the profile, but now I'm trying to figure out if that's a good thing in a vape. lol I definitely taste the cookie, and the oatmeal, and the raisin! I'm going 5 stars for now because it is what it said it would be. I don't know that I will want to vape it often, and I don't think it'll be for everyone, but it's a good recipe. Thanks!
